Summary: Noticed Two Bright lights below the north portion of Cassiopia, the noticed dark triangle, two lights faded as craft went North
divs: Sighting DetailsWalking my dog at Spruce Dr (Los Gatos Creek Trail) When crossing the bridge going East u noticed Two bright lights, thinking they were part of The Constellation Cassiopia I watched, thinking they were Out of place being much brighter than I ever Remember those stars being. As I looked the slowly Moved north, the I had a big surprise. I noticed they Were at each tip of a faint triangle. Only two light The part of the triangle with no light was pointing In the direction of a full moon. The lights dimmed As the triangle continued on its silent path. I called A nerby friend as this was happening but it was gone Too soon for him to look.Wow, overly very luck to see this. In all my years as an amateur astronomer I Never have seen a triangle.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Los Gatos
There were no other sightings in Los Gatos on or around October 11th 2011
